How Can We Serve You

Custom Development

Need to customize or integrate municipal data?
Proware has a decade of experience in custom development and integrating legacy data formats with new software implementations.

Learn More

Import Legacy Data

Are your files in many formats?
Proware can import and integrate custom legacy data in many different structures from; excel, SQL and many other legacy formats.

Learn More

Import from Other Applications

Access the inaccessible!
Access any Municipal database connected to Proware to prepare annual assessments, report on assessments for property

Learn More

Why Proware?

  • Designed to meet the specific requirements of the municipalities
  • Improve department workflows and process
  • Collect and organize all information in one place
  • Develop clear, accurate status reports for improved decision making and communication
